programme.title: The Daily Tip
programme.desc: Early Betting Tips to Give You The Edge. Your first source for the day's angles, hot takes, analysis and more with hosts Michael Jenkins and Chelsa Messinger. Weekdays from 6am-9am ET.

programme.title: Bet Sweats
programme.desc: Featuring two of the sharpest bettors in the game, Joe Ostrowski and Sam Panayotovich bring unmatched expertise. This show is a can't-miss for any sports or betting fan looking for actionable insights, bold predictions, and high-stakes entertainment.

programme.title: Coach and Company
programme.desc: Jonathan Coachman hosts this no-holds-barred daily sports talk show. "The Coach" leads dynamic discussions with a rotating cast of all-star analysts and sports insiders.

programme.title: Bellator MMA
programme.desc: Hometown favorite and No. 1 ranked welterweight Michael "Venom" Page seeks to thrill fans and capture the Interim Title against No. 4 ranked Logan Storley; Lyoto Machida versus Fabian Edwards in the co-main.

programme.title: Bellator MMA
programme.desc: Gegard Mousasi vs. Johnny Eblen, middleweight title bout; Magomed Magomedov vs. Enrique Barzola; Leandro Higo vs. Danny Sabatello; Bent Primus vs. Alexander Shabliy. From Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn.

programme.title: Bellator MMA
programme.desc: Former welterweight world champion Douglas Lima faces Jason Jackon in the 5-round main event. From Emerald Queen Casino, Tacoma, Wash. Also: Sidney Outlaw vs. Tofiq Musayev, lightweights; Usman Nurmagomedov vs. Chris Gonzalez, lightweights.

programme.title: GLORY 46 China
programme.desc: Alex Pereira takes on Simon Marcus for the GLORY middleweight championship in the main event.

programme.title: BKFC 52
programme.desc: From Colonial Life Arena, Columbia, SC.

programme.title: BKFC 38: Nguyen vs. Straus
programme.desc: A featherweight clash between Dat Nguyen and Daniel Straus. From Delray Beach Tennis Center in Delray Beach, Fla.

programme.title: BKFC 29
programme.desc: Features Britain Hart vs. Charisa Sigala, plus Kai Stewart vs. Rusty Crowder in bare knuckle boxing action from Great Falls, Mont. From Sept. 10, 2022.
